properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.server-addr
properties.description: nacos server address.  nacos 服务器地址

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.server-addr
properties.description: nacos discovery server address. 意义不明

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.service
properties.description: the service name to register, default value is ${spring.application.name}.  服务名

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.enabled
properties.description: enable nacos discovery or not.  是否启用服务发现

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.instance-enabled
properties.description: If instance is enabled to accept request. The default value is true. 如果实例能够接受请求。

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.ephemeral
properties.description: If instance is ephemeral.The default value is true. 如果实例是短暂的。默认值为真。

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.namingLoadCacheAtStart
properties.description: naming load from local cache at application start .应用程序启动时从本地缓存加载命名。

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.watch.enabled
properties.description: enable nacos discovery watch or not .

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.username
properties.description: nacos discovery service's username to authenticate.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.discovery.password
properties.description: nacos discovery service's password to authenticate.
